name: sine-surfer
description:
A one-button microgame about surfing. Tap/click/press a key to tilt the board up while in water. To score, get as much airtime as you can. Try to stay afloat as long as you can as the waves get steeper and steeper.

made using Kenta Cho's crisp-game-lib for the course CMPM 170 at UCSC
